entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 9:00 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 3 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
